page.title: 09NESCOT, EPSOM
page.content: {The North-East Surrey College of {Technology}was opened in 1953 as Ewell Technical College. It is situated on a composite site of 40 acres on the outskirts of Ewell village on the Reigate Road. NESCOT offers further and higher education for students of all ages, but especially for pre-university students. Courses are provided for every future career and some 7000-8000 students attend on a full-time or part-time basis, including a large number of overseas students. NESCOT has excellent facilities including research labs for biological studies and a strong computer department. It also offers courses in arts and crafts , as well as the performing arts using the Adrian Mann theatre.
